_header: England with the sea compassed about
_description: Brief political prophecy appended to Thomas of Erceldoune’s Prophecy in one manuscript — three couplets alternating with prose

BodAsh1386.First Lines:
England with þe sea compassed abouteof other lands haue thou
                    no doute…
BodAsh1386.Last Lines:
…England shall never be overcometill bayards grene with bloude
                    doe overronne
